meanings.definition: A structure with a roof and walls, such as a house or factory.
meanings.sent1: The tall building stood proudly in the city skyline.
meanings.sent2: I saw a new building being constructed on my way to work.
meanings.sent3: The building looked like a giant puzzle waiting to be solved.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was a building, growing stronger with each challenge.
meanings.sent5: The building loomed over the landscape, casting a shadow on the streets below.

meanings.definition: The act or process of constructing something.
meanings.sent1: The building of the bridge took months to complete.
meanings.sent2: We watched the building of the sandcastle on the beach.
meanings.sent3: The building of the Lego set was interrupted by a playful puppy.
meanings.sent4: His confidence was like a building, steadily rising as he achieved his goals.
meanings.sent5: The building of trust between them was slow but steady, like a carefully laid brick wall.
